public class Stringer
extends Object
Holds string-munging functions

Stringer()

indent(String, String)
Adds a prefix before each line in str
intToBytes(int)
Converts n to an array of 4 bytes
pad(String, int)
Pads or trims s to exactly n characters
shortToBytes(short)
Converts n to an array of 2 bytes, first the high byte then the low byte
shortToBytes(short[])
Converts an array of n short values to an array of 2*n bytes, alternating high and low bytes from consecutive entries.

shortToBytes

Converts an array of n short values to an array of 2*n bytes, alternating high and low bytes from consecutive entries.
